overview: Ester, owner of a pole dance studio, navigates the highs and lows of dating as a queer polyamorous woman. At her studio, all bodies and genders are welcome, spontaneous twerking is encouraged, and glitter is God. Together with the help of her friends, they hustle to build a safe space for their community of outsiders.
tagline: Why out a cap on love?
title: Polyester
